about.title: About
about.shortBio: f3dRaL is a boundary-pushing artist and producer creating immersive sonic experiences that blend cutting-edge production with raw emotion. Known for genre-defying tracks and captivating visual aesthetics.
about.longBio1: Emerging from the underground music scene, f3dRaL has carved out a unique space where experimental sounds meet mainstream appeal. With a background in both music production and visual arts, every release is a carefully crafted multimedia experience.
about.longBio2: Drawing inspiration from diverse genres including electronic, hip-hop, and ambient music, f3dRaL's sound is constantly evolving while maintaining a distinctive sonic signature. The artist's work has been featured across major streaming platforms and has garnered attention from both critics and fans worldwide.
about.longBio3: Beyond music, f3dRaL is committed to pushing creative boundaries through collaborations with visual artists, fashion designers, and fellow musicians, creating a holistic artistic vision that extends far beyond the studio.
